subject: p10886362
Findings: In comparison with study of, the mediastinal and left chest tube has been removed and there is no evidence of pneumothorax. The overall appearance of the heart and lungs is essentially unchanged. Persistent pulmonary vascular congestion with opacification, especially at the left base consistent with effusion and volume loss in the lower lobe. Less prominent changes are seen at the right base.
